arts.sum: Inter Milan arrive in the capital this evening looking to secure a sixth consecutive victory across all competitions and draw level with Roma in the Serie A standings, as all eyes are on Captain Lautaro Martinez to repeat his heroics from last year’s fixture. arts.ttl: Roma Coach Weighs Key Attacking Choices Ahead Of Crucial Serie A Clash With Inter Milan
arts.sum: Roma coach Gian Piero Gasperini is weighing up a number of key attacking choices ahead of tonight’s Serie A showdown with Inter Milan, including potentially utilising Paulo Dybala as a false nine. La Gazzetta dello Sport, via FCInterNews, report that the primary doubt concerns the forward line. Gasperini could deploy Dybala as a false nine. arts.ttl: Roma vs. Inter: clash at the top
arts.sum: The official meetings between the two teams at Roma`s home total 102 –excluding the single- match Coppa Italia finals of the 2007/08 edition (2-1 Giallorossi victory) and 2009/10 (1-0 Nerazzurri success) – with a score of 40 Roma wins, 28 draws, and 34 Inter victories. Roma haven`t beaten Inter at the Olimpico since October 2, 2016, a 2-1 win in Serie A.
